programme.title: Uptown Saturday Night
programme.desc: Blue-collar buddies (Sidney Poitier, Bill Cosby) search the underworld for a winning lottery ticket lost in a nightclub holdup.

programme.title: Greased Lightning
programme.desc: World War II veteran Wendell Scott (Richard Pryor) runs Georgia moonshine and becomes the first black NASCAR driver.

programme.title: Moving
programme.desc: A yuppie (Richard Pryor) loses his job in New Jersey and moves his wife (Beverly Todd) and family to Boise, Idaho.

programme.title: The Black Godfather
programme.desc: A black gangster and his cohorts attempt to keep Mafia-controlled drug pushers out of their neighborhood.

programme.title: The American Dream
programme.desc: Two college football players struggle to avoid temptation and keep themselves on the right path.

programme.title: Knightriders
programme.desc: George Romero's unusual story of a modern-day Renaissance troupe whose participants follow a medieval code of honor.

programme.title: Coming Soon to Soul Flix
programme.desc: "Coming To Soul Flix" features "Arena," "The Big Doll House," "Caged Heat," "Assault on Precinct 13," "The Bad Bunch" and others.

programme.title: Soul!
programme.desc: Ruby Dee and Ossie Davis, aided by the music of composer-saxophonist Lucky Thompson, give dramatic readings of the poetry of a writer named Robert Cornell Kaufman.

programme.title: Soul!
programme.desc: The songwriting/performing duo Nick Ashford and Valerie Simpson.

programme.title: Soul!
programme.desc: Felipe Luciano hosts this showcase of Latin music on Soul!; musicians Tito Puente and Willie Colon are accompanied by their musical groups.

programme.title: Soul!
programme.desc: Female singing trio LaBelle; conga drum/bongo musician Mongo Santamaria.

programme.title: The Black Cobra
programme.desc: A detective (Fred Williamson) protects a murder witness (Eva Grimaldi) from a vicious gang of bikers.

programme.title: The Black Cobra 2
programme.desc: Interpol pairs a Chicago policeman (Fred Williamson) with an inspector (Nicholas Hammond) on the trail of terrorists in Manila.

programme.title: Black Cobra 3: Manila Connection
programme.desc: An agent (Forry Smith) teams up with his father's buddy (Fred Williamson) on a jungle mission to recover stolen weapons.

programme.title: Who's the Man?
programme.desc: Two Harlem barbers (Ed Lover, Andre Romelle Young) score well on a multiple-choice police exam and use their badges to expose a ruthless developer.

programme.title: Crazy Six
programme.desc: A turf war erupts in a futuristic, anarchistic Europe between rival crime families supplying weapons.
